modules.description: Provides functions to generate QuickCheck properties from type definitions, supporting custom generators and shrinkers for arbitrary data. Works with OCaml's type system to derive testable properties for algebraic data types and records. Enables property-based testing by automatically creating test cases for custom types and their constructors.

Generates QCheck or QCheck2 arbitrary values from type declarations, using provided location and recursion flags. Processes OCaml type declarations to produce test data structures for property-based testing. Constructs generators that can be used to automatically create random inputs for testing functions.
